original_text: And it came to pass, when he had made an end of speaking unto Saul, that the soul of Jonathan was knit with the soul of David, and Jonathan loved him as his own soul.
korean_text: 다윗이 사울에게 말하기를 마치매 요나단의 마음이 다윗의 마음과 하나가 되어 요나단이 그를 자기 생명 같이 사랑하니라

sentences.original_text: when he had made an end of speaking unto Saul
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 사울에게 말하는 것을 마쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: that the soul of Jonathan was knit with the soul of David
sentences.korean_translation: 요나단의 영혼이 다윗의 영혼과 하나가 되었고

sentences.original_text: and Jonathan loved him as his own soul
